name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle, non-foaming face wash with hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and glycerin to help hydrate skin without stripping moisture.

name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Melt-In Milk Sunscreen SPF 60
description: A fast-absorbing, velvety texture sunscreen suitable for face and body. Broad-spectrum protection with a non-greasy finish.

name: Tretinoin Cream/Gel (Retin-A)
description: A powerful retinoid that increases skin cell turnover. Used to treat acne, fine lines, and hyperpigmentation. Requires a dermatologist's prescription.

name: Biolage Volume Bloom Shampoo
description: Gently cleanses hair with minimal stripping while adding lightweight volume and shine. Paraben-free formula suitable for color-treated hair.
